## XPaths Obsoleted

- /bgp-state/bgp-route-vrfs/bgp-route-vrf/bgp-route-afs/bgp-route-af/bgp-peer-groups/bgp-peer-group/adv-ix
- /bgp-state/bgp-route-vrfs/bgp-route-vrf/bgp-route-afs/bgp-route-af/bgp-peer-groups/bgp-peer-group/fmt-grp-ix
- /bgp-state/bgp-route-vrfs/bgp-route-vrf/bgp-route-afs/bgp-route-af/bgp-peer-groups/bgp-peer-group/updated-messages
- /bgp-state-data/bgp-route-vrfs/bgp-route-vrf/bgp-route-afs/bgp-route-af/bgp-peer-groups/bgp-peer-group/adv-ix
- /bgp-state-data/bgp-route-vrfs/bgp-route-vrf/bgp-route-afs/bgp-route-af/bgp-peer-groups/bgp-peer-group/fmt-grp-ix
- /bgp-state-data/bgp-route-vrfs/bgp-route-vrf/bgp-route-afs/bgp-route-af/bgp-peer-groups/bgp-peer-group/updated-messages

### Description

status changed from current to obsolete

### Reason

Fields adv-ix, fmt-grp-ix and updated-messages are irrelevant under bgp peer-group oper
